topic.title: EMS Allergies And Adverse Reactions Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67841-7" EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] title = "EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67794-8" Existence of drug allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
If NEMSIS EHistory.06 is "No Known Drug Allergies," the value should be FALSE. If it is a proper value, the value should be TRUE. If it is a flavor of null, the appropriate flavor should be used here. See the null table to translate NEMSIS flavors into HL7; original values may be stored in Observation.text.
This organizer MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67850-8" Drug allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="106190000" allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT)
Such components Contains exactly one [1..1] participant
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity
This playingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.06

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69747-4" EMS Existence of environmental allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
If NEMSIS EHistory.07 has no values, this is FALSE; otherwise it is TRUE.
This organizer MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69748-2" Known allergies to food or environmental agents (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet EnvironmentalAllergyType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.83 STATIC
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67841-7" EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] title = "EMS Allergies and Adverse Reactions"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67794-8" Existence of drug allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
If NEMSIS EHistory.06 is "No Known Drug Allergies," the value should be FALSE. If it is a proper value, the value should be TRUE. If it is a flavor of null, the appropriate flavor should be used here. See the null table to translate NEMSIS flavors into HL7; original values may be stored in Observation.text.
This organizer MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67850-8" Drug allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="106190000" allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT)
Such components Contains exactly one [1..1] participant
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity
This playingEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.06

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69747-4" EMS Existence of environmental allergy (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
If NEMSIS EHistory.07 has no values, this is FALSE; otherwise it is TRUE.
This organizer MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69748-2" Known allergies to food or environmental agents (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Such components SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet EnvironmentalAllergyType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.83 STATIC

p.ph: EMS Allergies And Adverse Reactions Section
